com.easypc.chip8

Class MediaOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easypc.chip8.MediaOutput

  • public class MediaOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    An Easy Wrapper for the GUI Output / Backend to Display Stuff for the Chip-8 System
    Author:
    crazysaem

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearScreen()
      Clears the GameCanvas and shows only Black
      void displaySprite(int x, int y, int n)
      Displays a n-long Sprite which is read from the virtual memory via the I-Pointer and XORed to the Screen This Information is entirely supplied by the opCode "If this causes any pixels to be erased, VF is set to 1, otherwise it is set to 0"
      void showGames()
      Shows the list of available ROMs inside the GameCanvas TODO: Maybe use a SWING overlay to make it easier ? Or use a LWJGL GUI Library: http://twl.l33tlabs.org/ or http://nifty-gui.lessvoid.com/
      void startBeep()
      Starts a Beep Sound
      void stopBeep()
      Stops the Beep Sound

    • Method Detail

      • displaySprite

        public void displaySprite(int x,
                 int y,
                 int n)
        Displays a n-long Sprite which is read from the virtual memory via the I-Pointer and XORed to the Screen This Information is entirely supplied by the opCode "If this causes any pixels to be erased, VF is set to 1, otherwise it is set to 0"
        Parameters:
        x - The x Coordinate for the Sprite
        y - The y Coordinate for the Sprite
        n - The Read Count for the Pointer

      • clearScreen

        public void clearScreen()
        Clears the GameCanvas and shows only Black

      • showGames

        public void showGames()
        Shows the list of available ROMs inside the GameCanvas TODO: Maybe use a SWING overlay to make it easier ? Or use a LWJGL GUI Library: http://twl.l33tlabs.org/ or http://nifty-gui.lessvoid.com/

      • startBeep

        public void startBeep()
        Starts a Beep Sound

      • stopBeep

        public void stopBeep()
        Stops the Beep Sound
